label.value: Advanced Skill: Snap Out of It!
You have an been acknowledged as someone who could one day influence the fate of Middle-Earth
You have been acknowledged as someone who could one day influence the fate of Middle-Earth
You are able to ride mounts.
You are able to ride mounts.
Increased Armour Debuff with Reveal Weakness
You are skilled at detecting even the smallest weaknesses in your enemy's armour when using your Reveal Weakness skill.
Increases the damage dealt by your off-hand weapon
You are able to wield your off-hand weapon more efficiently, dealing greater damage to your foes.
This effect enables you to gain critical responses from both critical responses and evade combat events.
Skills that are normally unlocked by scoring Critical Hits now also unlock when you successfully Evade an attack.
After using your Double-edged Strike, you can make two attacks against your target.
After using your Double-edged Strike, you can make two additional attacks against your target.
Decreases Trip reset time by ${VALUE} Seconds
Trip no longer breaks stealth and it reduces it's cooldown by 40 seconds.
Trip no longer breaks stealth and it reduces it's cooldown by 40 seconds.
After using your Double-edged Strike, you spy an opening and seize it doing high damage and having a chance of knocking your opposition into a conjuction state.
After using your Double-edged Strike, you make an additional attack, inflicting high damage, with a chance of initiating an opportunity to execute Fellowship skills against the enemy.
The Loyalty and stalwart nature of your pets know no bounds.
Your pets have higher Morale and increased offensive and defensive capabilities. You must resummon the pet for this to take effect.

Your companions have better morale, attack increase, raised critical chances, increased stealth detection, increased stealth and greater defensive capabilties. You must resummon the companion for this to take effect.
Only the Eldar and Wizards rival your knowledge of nature, this skill enables you to bring down the wrath of the natural world on your foes.
Only the Eldar and Wizards rival your knowledge of nature. You are able to bring down the wrath of the natural world upon your foes.
You are a friend of the eagles and may now summon one to aid you.
You are a friend of the Eagles and may summon one to aid you.
Your fire-based skills are more damaging.
Your fire-based skills inflict 10% greater damage.
Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills
You are able to summon a more powerful bear.
The Power of your bear-friend is increased.
Gain a Focus (Aim) Pip every 10 seconds while in Precision Stance
Your Focus increases by 1 every 10 seconds while you are in a Precision Stance.
Reduced Induction Time for Barbed Arrow & Swift Arrow
You are able to release your Barbed Arrow and Swift Bow more quickly.
Acts as a power heal for each Bow Shot.
The righteousness of your cause allows you to recover Power with each successful ranged attack.
You fire with the skill of Bard himself driving fear into evil enemies.
You attack with the skill of Bard the Bowman himself, driving fear into your enemies.
When the need is high, a hunter can pack up and move on with little rest, restoring your power and morale.
When the need is great, you can move on with little rest, restoring your Power and Morale.
You rain five thorn arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to pin multiple targets.
You rain 5 thorn-arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to root multiple targets.
The ways of the elder age are not lost to all races yet, you may bring new inspiration to those whose morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated target in combat.
The ways of the elder ages are not lost to all races yet. You may bring new inspiration to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated ally in combat.
This song enables you to temporarily reduce the dread of an area for sixty seconds.
This Song enables you to temporarily reduce the Dread of an area for a short time.

This skill calls upon song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that will slow the creatures who are hit by it, you have a short window after playing a tier 3 song to play one of these, and it will reset your ballad counter back to start.

This Anthem allows you to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that slows enemies who are affected by it. You have a short window after playing a tier 3 song to play Anthem, which will reset your Ballad counter to the beginning.
Increases the duration of your Anthems that use duration effects
The duration of your Anthems is increased by 15 seconds.
You are able to wear medium armour.
Your Escape from Darkness ability is greatly improved and your Cry of Vengeance will revive one additional ally.
Your Escape from Darkness ability is greatly improved and your Cry of Vengeance will revive one additional ally.
Your voice calls upon the will of the Dunedain protecting a companion but at the cost of half your power.
You are able to protect a companion, but at the cost of half your Power.
You levy a curse on your foe which increases the damage you can do to the creature.
You levy a curse upon your foe which increases the damage you can do to it.
Your very presence inspires those around you to perform better in combat.
Your very presence inspires those around you to perform greater deeds in battle.
Increases the duration of Last Stand, and you are healed at the end
Your Last Stand lasts longer, and you are healed when it ends.
You may pass the watching stones unmolested.
You can shrug off the worst effects of the Fell Watching-stones' oppressive will.
Enables the Hunter to apply Fire Oil to their arrows.
Enables hunters to apply fire-oil to their arrows.
Enables the Hunter to apply Light Oil to their arrows.
Enables hunters to apply light-oil to their arrows.
An aggressive triple attack that engenders threat.
You make an aggressive triple attack that draws the enemy's attention to yourself.
A Cry of Defiance that robs the monsters of their ability to use power and gives it to you.
A cry of defiance that robs enemies of their ability to use Power and transfers it to you.
A full area-of-effect attack of a huge magnitude but comes at the cost of threat.
A full area-of-effect attack that inflicts huge damage, while drawing the attention of your enemies to yourself.
Your damage and Power recovery are increased.
Allow wielding of Heavy Shields and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
You have the ability to wield heavy shields.
Increases the critical damage chance of Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
Your chance of scoring a Critical Hit is increased for: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike.
Line Bonus: Your parry response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.
You regenerate some of your power whenver you parry and incoming attack.
You recover some of your Power whenever you parry an incoming attack.
Line Bonus: Your block response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.
You regenerate some of your power whenver you block and incoming attack.
You recover some of your Power whenever you block an incoming attack.
You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered from Overwhelm or Shiv, potentially knocking him down.
You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered from Overwhelm or Thrust, potentially knocking it down.
After a successful Shield Bash or Shield Taunt, you may bash him again with your shield for greater damage. This skill generates additional threat
After a successful Shield-bash or Shield-taunt, you may bash your enemy again with your shield for greater damage. This skill more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.
You focus yourself on enraging your enemies.
You focus yourself on enraging your enemies.

You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver. This skill generates additional threat and forces nearby opponents to attack you as well as raising guardians ward.
You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver. This skill also activates your Guardian's Ward.
Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.
Improves the effects of your Banner of Victory
The Power-enhancing effects provided by your Herald of Victory are more effective.
Those that serve the forces of the ring, are beginning to seek conflict with you directly, lest you foil their schemes.
Those that serve the Dark Lord of Mordor are beginning to seek conflict with you directly, lest you foil their schemes.
As a hardy warrior of Middle-Earth, you have seen much conflict.
As a hardy warrior of Middle-Earth, you have seen much conflict.
The road to saving Middle-Earth is long, but you are already walking it.
The road to saving Middle-Earth is long, but you are already walking it.
Allies renewed by Escape From Darkness will return with full Morale and more Power.
Allies revived by Escape From Darkness will return with full Morale and more Power.
Rallying Cry will heal a small amount of power as well
Your Rallying Cry will also heal a small amount of power, in addition to its normal effects.
Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.
Increases the attack speed buff of War-cry
Your War-cry encourages your allies to attack with even greater speed.
Your routing cry does more damage and will apply a stun to everyone it effects
Your Routing Cry now stuns your foes and inflicts more damage.
Battle Shout now recovers ${VALUE} seconds faster.
Your Battle-shout recovers more quickly than before.
Your Battle-shout recovers more quickly than before.
Your skill with arms reduces the chance that your attacks will miss.
Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.
Improves the effects of your Banner of War
The Might and Agility increases provided by your Herald of War are more effective.
Your Words of Courage will heal more
Your Words of Courage greatly increases the morale of your allies.
Reduces the power cost of your Cries and Shouts
The power costs of your Cries and Shouts are reduced.
Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.
Improves the effects of your Banner of Hope
The Morale-enhancing effects provided by your Herald of Hope are more effective.
Increases chance to crit w/ Devastating Blow and Pressing Attack
You have a greater chance of landing a Critical Hit with your Devastating Blow and Pressing Attack.
Increases the threat generated by your Threatening Shout
Your Threatening Shout more strongly directs the enemy's ire towards you.
Reduces the threat generated by your Cries and Heals
Your Cries and healing skills draw less attention from your enemies.
Your Flurry will last an additional 10 seconds and speed you up an extra 5%. Your total Might is also increased.
Your Flurry lasts longer and your attack speed is increased.
Your Swift Strike skill now generates a fervour pip on a successful attack. Your total Might is also increased.
Your Swift Strike skill generates 1 additional Fervour on Critical Hits.
Increases the critical damage multiplier of Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
Your damage multiplier for scoring Critical Hits is increased for: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike.
Your Blade-storm attacks now can effect up to ten targets. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
Your Blade-storm now affects up to 10 targets.
Your Bracing attack provides additional morale for yourself increasing a small amount for each enemy around you. Blade-wall and Blade-storm also do more damage.
Your Bracing attack provides additional morale for yourself increasing a small amount for each enemy around you.
Your Wild Attack will generate a fervour pip on a critical. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
Your Wild Attack now generates 1 additional Fervour after a Critical Hit.
Your Wild Attack generates additional threat and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
Your Wild Attack more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.
Your Blade-wall skill will generate a fervour pip on a succesful attack. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
Your Blade-wall skill generates 1 Fervour for every succesful attack.
On a critical attack Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes will apply an additional bleed. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
On a Critical Hit, the following skills will now apply a bleed: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike
Your base block rate is increasd and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
You are able to more effectively block attacks.
Your Blade-storm now requires only 3 pips to execute and costs only 3 pips. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
Your Blade-storm costs and requires only 3 Fervour to execute.
Your Battle Frenzy now fill you fervour meter generating 5 pips. Your total Might is also increased.
Your Battle Frenzy generates 5 Fervour, totally filling your Fervour meter.
Your Dire Need skill now also increases fervour by 5 pips. Your total Might is also increased.
Dire Need now increases your Fervour by 5 and recovers 5 minutes faster.
Your Exchange of Blows procs more often, produces additional threat, and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
Your Exchange of Blows executes more often and more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.
Sting resets more quickly and does more damage. Your base Might is also increased.
You attack more quickly with your Sting skill, inflicting greater damage.
Damage your attacker whenever you block an incoming attack. Your base Might is also increased.
You damage your attacker whenever you block an incoming attack.
Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat
Your Guardian's Ward also increases your natrual damage mitigation. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
Your Guardian's Ward increases your common damage mitigation.
Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat
Increases the Block Rate & Mitigation boost provided by your shield. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
You use your shield more efficiently, blocking more and reducing the damage dealt to you.
Your Catch a Breath skill heals additional morale and also heals power. Your base Vitality is also increased.
Your Catch a Breath skill heals additional Morale and also heals Power.
Your Vexing Blow may hit up to two targets in a 90-degree arc and recovers faster. Your base Vitality is also increased.
Vexing Blow can hit two additional targets in a 90-degree arc and recovers 1.5 seconds faster.
Your base movement rate is increasted by 5%. Your vitality is also increased.
You are able to move more quickly in and out of battle.
Increases your base attack rate by 5%. Your base Might is also increased.
Your attack speed is increased beyond your normal abilities.
Your Challenge skills takes less time to reset. Your base Vitality is also increased.
Your Challenge skill recovers 15 seconds quicker.
Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat
Your Protection skill now reduces the threat generated by your target and increases threat generated by you. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
Your Protection skill makes your target less threatening.
Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat
Your base vitality and fate are increased. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
Your stoic nature increases your base Vitality and Fate.
Deep Breath resets faster and lasts longer. Your base Might is also increased.
Your strong lungs enable Deep Breath to recover 2.5 minutes quicker.
Line Bonus: Your Shield Swipe response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.
Warrior's Heart resets faster and opens up all your base reactionary skills.
Warrior's Heart recovers 90 seconds quicker and allows you to use your reactive skills.
Line Bonus: Your Retaliation response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.
Thrill of Danger resets faster and opens up all your base reactionary skills.
Thrill of Danger recovers 2 minutes quicker and allows you to use your reactive skills.
Decreased chance for monsters to break free of your trap on damage
It is more difficult for enemies to break free of your traps.
Reduced Recovery Time of all melee skills
All of your melee skills recover more quickly than before.
Increased Magnitude of Barbed Arrow DOT
Wounds caused by your Barbed Arrow bleed more profusely.
Your Swift Bow inflicts greater damage to your enemies.
Penetrating Shot costs one less Focus (Aim) Pip
The Focus cost for your Penetrating Shot is reduced by 1.
Increased Tracking range, Track stealthed monsters, Increased overall stealth detection
Your exceptional senses allow you to track creatures over a greater distance, even if they are using Stealth, and to more easily detect creatures using Stealth.
Rain of Arrows now criticals more often
You have a greater chance of landing Critical Hits with your Rain of Arrows, and the Critical Hits do more damage.
Rain of Arrows costs one less Focus (Aim) Pip
The Focus cost for your Rain of Arrows is reduced by 1.
Intent Concentration also restores some Power
Your Intent Concentration also restores some Power, in addition to its normal effects.
Ranged Critical Hits increase your Focus (Aim) by one Pip
When you land a Critical Hit with a ranged attack, your Focus increases by 1.
Your Penetrating Shot pierces more deeply through your enemy's armour, ignoring more of the armour's damage reduction.
Endurance Stance further reduces Power Cost of: Barbed Arrow, Penetrating Shot, Merciful Shot, Swift Bow, Rain of Arrows and Quick Shot.
Your Endurance Stance further reduces the Power cost and threat generation of your ranged skills.
Beneath Notice lasts 10 seconds longer and draws even less attention from your enemies.
Reduced Recovery Time for Needful Haste and Intent Concentration
Your Needful Haste and Intent Concentration recover more quickly.
You have a chance of stunning an enemy with power from your staff strike and increase your confidence and thus your overall morale.
Staff Strike is more damaging, can stun opponents and will do bonus damage on flanked enemies. Your training also makes you more confident in battle.
This improves the effects of your Ancient Wisdom and enables you to use your Power of Knowledge skill for a longer period of time.
This improves your Ancient Wisdom effect magnitude and enables you to use your Power of Knowledge skill for a longer period of time.
Your Beacon of Hope ability costs you less Morale.
Beacon of Hope has a lower Morale cost, recovers faster and has a shorter cast time.
Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills
Your knowledge of the Signs of Animals gives you greater control over them, lessening the skill cost and enhancing their duration.
Your knowledge of the Signs of the Wild gives you greater control over them, lessening their cost and enhancing their duration.
Your number of targets for Fire-lore, Wind-lore, and Herb-lore are increased.
Your knowledge of herbs, fire, and wind are unmatched, increasing your ability to use them.
The costs of your remedy skills and the time it takes to execute them are reduced. This includes Beacon of Hope, Tend the Sick, Leechcraft, Share the Power, and Inner Flame
You gain a number of bonuses to your healing and restorative skills.
Your animals have increased health, increased power, attack faster and deal more damage.
Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills
The combat prowess of your pets is increased.
The Combat Prowess of your companions are increased. This includes, attack, defense, and stealth detection.
Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills
You gain bonuses to the Sign of Righteousness and Sign of Vigilance skills.
You are well versed in the knowledge of the Dúnedain and their signs, allowing you to increase their duration and effectiveness. This includes: Sign of Righteousness and Sign of Vigilance.
You gain a bonus to Power costs for overt displays of magical power. This includes Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn, and Ents go to War.
Reduces power costs and the casting time of your overt displays of magical power. This includes: Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.
The Morale costs of your overt displays of magical power are reduced. This includes Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.
This gives you a reduction to the morale costs on overt displays of magical power. This includes: Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.
Decreased threat when using damaging skills
You have a keen understanding of what it means to be a keeper of ancient lore in Middle-earth, often going unnoticed when you do choose to call upon your knowledge.
You have a keen understanding of what it means to be a keeper of ancient lore in Middle-earth, often going unnoticed when you do choose to call upon your knowledge.
Your Tend the Sick and Leechcraft skills can affect up to six targets.
Your Tend the Sick and Leechcraft works on all allies within an area-of-effect. This also enables Leechcraft to be used in combat.
Your skills have a chance to restore a small amount of Power.
All of your skills have a chance to restore a small amount of Power.
Your magical abilities cost less Power. This includes Signs, Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Power of Knowledge, Share the Power, Light of the Rising Dawn, and Ents Go to War.
All of your magical skills have a lower cost to your Power.
The duration of your Ballads is increased by 10 seconds.
Increased In-Combat Regen Effect when casting Anthem of Valar
When using Anthem of the Valar, your regeneration in combat is increased.
Increase the Effectiveness of Song of Aid
Your Song of Aid lasts 10 seconds longer and recovers 20% faster.
Increases the duration you have to play the next tier of your ballads.
Gain a 5 second longer window of opportunity in which to perform tiered Ballads.
Your Heralds Strike is more likely to crit.
Your Herald's Strike deals double damage.
This skill transforms your Ballad of Vigour and Ballad of Balance to become slower songs, that no longer deal damage but act upon your fellowship for a longer duration.
This skill transforms your Ballad of Vigour and Ballad of Balance into slower songs that no longer deal damage, but act upon your fellowship for a longer duration.
Reduces the power cost of all cries.
The Power costs of all your Cries are reduced.
Decreases the powercost for all morale increasing abilities.
The Power costs for your morale-renewing skills are reduced.
When you land a Critical Hit with your Piercing Cry, your enemy is stunned. This trait also causes your Piercing Cry to recover faster.
When you land a Critical Hit with your Piercing Cry, your enemy is stunned. Piercing Cry gains 25% to it's critical chance and it's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
Your inductions are harder to interrupt.
Your induction skills execute quicker, making you harder to disrupt.
Your Tier 1 and Tier 2 Ballads inflict more damage to your enemies.
Your Tier 1 and Tier 2 Ballads inflict more damage to your enemies.
This adds an increased morale and power resurrection to the skills that bring you back from defeat.
Enlivening Grace and Rally grant more morale and power. Rally's cast time is reduced by 2 seconds and it's recovery time is reduced by 5 minutes.
All of your Songs recover 20% faster.
Reduced aggro on all special Minstrel abilities.
The use of your skills draws less attention from your enemies.
DOT magnitude of Cunning Attack increased
The wounds caused by your Cunning Attacks bleed more profusely.
You are able to use your Subtle Stab skill with greater speed, inflicting more damage.
Your Riddles are far more perplexing than your foes can comprehend, both stunning and mesmerizing them.
Decreased chance for Stealth attacks to Miss,Parry,Block,Evade
Your attacks while using Stealth are far more accurate, reducing the chances that you may miss or that your enemy may somehow avoid them.
Reduces the recovery time of Aim by ${VALUE}s.
You are able to take Aim more quickly than you once did.
You are able to evade attacks more easily than before.
Dust in the Eyes is now AOE.
Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.
Dust In The Eyes - Affects multiple nearby targets
Your Dust in the Eyes skill affects multiple enemies nearby.
Increased chance for Stealth attacks to score a Critical Hit
You are able to land precise blows when attacking while using Stealth, increasing your chances of landing a Critical Hit with Surprise Strike, Cunning Attack, or Provoke.
Your ability to move about with Stealth has developed beyond your natural aptitude.
Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.
You are able to use your Disable skill to greatly reduce your enemy's speed.
Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.
Counter Defence - Increase Target Critical Hit Vulnerability
Improves your Counter Defence skill to further increase your opponent's vulnerability to Critical Hits.
Magnitude of your Trick debuffs Increase after participation in a successful conjunction
Completing a Fellowship Manoeuvre will empower the burglar, based on what Manoeuvre was completed.
You are able to move more quickly while using Stealth.
Your Stealth is improved, allowing you to move more quickly while sneaking about.
Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.
When you Enrage your foes, they are likely to engage you in melee combat.
This enables you to use a sword.
This allows the dual wielding of weapons.
You now may dual-wield a sword and a staff. Your melee skills are also improved.
You now may dual wield sword and staff as well as gaining some improved skill in melee.
You are able to track the location of ore deposits.
You are able to track the location of tree branches.
You are able to track the location of crops.
Increases the damage dealt by your attacks.
Increases the damage dealt by your attacks.
Increases your ability to avoid attacks.
Increases your ability to avoid attacks.
Increases your resistance to certain negative effects.
Increases your resistance to certain negative effects.
Allows the use of One-Handed Axes
Allows the use of One-Handed Axes. Axes have a small chance of reducing the target's armour at the expense of missing more often than with other weapons.
Allows the use of One-Handed Clubs
Allows the use of One-Handed Clubs. Clubs have a small chance of stunning the target.
Allows the use of One-Handed Hammers
Allows the use of One-Handed Hammers. Hammers have a small chance of stunning the target.
Allows the use of One-Handed Maces
Allows the use of One-Handed Maces. Maces have a small chance of stunning the target.
Allows the use of One-Handed Swords
Allows the use of One-Handed Swords. Swords have a small to-hit chance increase.
Allows the use of Daggers. Daggers have a small chance of landing Critical Hits at the expense of overall damage.
Allows wielding of a second weapon in the off-hand.
Allows the wielding of a second weapon in the off-hand.
Allows the use of specialized equipment.
Allows the use of Specialized Equipment.
Allows the use of Light Armour
Allows the use of Light Armour.
Allows the use of Medium Armour
Allows the use of Medium Armour.
Allows the use of Two-Handed Axes
Allows the use of Two-Handed Axes. Axes have a small chance of reducing the target's armour at the expense of missing more often than with other weapons.
Allows the use of Two-Handed Hammers
Allows the use of Two-Handed Hammers. Hammers have a small chance of stunning the target.
Allows the use of Two-Handed Swords
Allows the use of Two-Handed Swords. Swords have a small to-hit chance increase.
Allows the use of Spears. Spears have a small chance of wounding the target, inflicting damage over time.
Reduces Miss by a medium amount.
Allows the use of Bows. Bows have a small chance of landing Critical Hits when using auto-attack.
Allows the use of Heavy Armour
Allows the use of Heavy Armour.
Reduces Miss by a medium amount.
Reduces Miss by a small amount.
Allows the use of Two-Handed Clubs
Allows the use of Two-Handed Clubs. Clubs have a small chance of stunning the target.
Allows the use of Halberds. Halberds increase threat level, drawing the attention of your enemies upon yourself.
Allows the usage of Summoning Horns.
Allows the use of summoning horns.
Allows the use of Two-Handed Staves
Allows the use of Two-Handed Staves.
Reduces Miss by a medium amount.
Reduces Miss by a medium amount.
Reduces Miss by a medium amount.
Reduces Miss by a small amount.
Allows the use of Heavy Shields
Allows the use of Heavy Shields.
Allows the use of Crossbows. Crossbows lower your chance of blocking attacks when using auto-attack.
Adds ${VALUE} meters to maximum distance of ranged auto-attack.
Increases the maximum distance of your ranged auto-attacks.
Your skill with ranged weapons allows you to attack from a greater distance than others.
Enables your Jagged Cut skill to sometimes cause damage over time on your targets
Enables your Jagged Cut skill to sometimes cause damage over time on your targets
When you use Glory in Victory you no longer take additional damage in melee.
When you use Glory in Victory you no longer take additional damage in melee.
You can use your Devastating Strike more often.
You can use your Devastating Strike more often.
You are hardier than most and can recover from being knocked down and stunned.
You are hardier than most and can recover from being knocked down and stunned.
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver
Shortens the induction time of your web attacks by .25 seconds.
Shortens the induction time of your web attacks by .25 seconds.
You spray your target with clinging, sticky webs, reducing their chance to Parry or Evade.
You spray your target with clinging, sticky webs, reducing their chance to Parry or Evade.
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
A different visual appearance for your Spider Weaver
In addition to slowing your target, your Hindering Shot will also briefly root them in place.
In addition to slowing your target, your Hindering Shot will also briefly root them in place.
You carefully place a snare on the ground to trap your foes.
You carefully place a snare on the ground to trap your foes.
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Blackarrow
Targets are revived at higher health and power. Also, the recovery timer is shortened.
Targets are revived at higher health and power. Also, the recovery timer is shortened.
You can shout at an ally who is stunned or knocked down and they will begin to recover.
You can shout at an ally who is stunned or knocked down and they will begin to recover.
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader
A different visual appearance for your Uruk Warleader

Charity has its rewards. You find yourself more resistant to wounds, able to defend against ranged attacks more easily, and able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat.

Your compassion is one of your greatest strengths. You find that you are able to defend against ranged attacks more easily, are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, and are able to defend against magical attacks more easily.

Your actions have instilled in you a great sense of confidence. You are more resistant to the effects of fear, your Will is stronger, and you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat.
Your determination has won you many victories. You have superior Agility, you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat, and your Morale is increased.
The discipline you maintain makes you stronger. Your Might is increased, you are more resistant to diseases, and are able to defend against melee attacks more easily.
You have a proven empathy for those in need. You know how to use your armour to greater effect, you are destined to a greater Fate, and you are more resistant to the effects of fear.
Your fidelity has earned you the respect of those around you. You are more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow, you have greater Vitality, and your Power is increased.

Your struggles have built in you tremendous fortitude. You find that you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat, your Might is increased, and you are more resistant to diseases.
Your honesty has earned you the trust of those around you. Your Power is increased, you know how to use your armour to greater effect, and you are destined to a greater Fate.
Your honour is without peer. You are more resistant to poisons, more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow, and you have greater Vitality.
Your idealism can brook no fault. You are destined to a greater Fate, you are more resistant to the effects of fear, and your Will is stronger.

You are a servant of justice. You find that you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat, your Morale is increased, and you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat.
Your loyalty shall be rewarded. You find that you have greater Vitality, your Power is increased, and you know how to use your armour to greater effect.

You have learned the value of mercy. You find that you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, are able to defend against magical attacks more easily, and have superior Agility.
Patience is a virtue. You find yourself able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, more resistant to wounds, and able to defend against ranged attacks more easily.
Your innocence can be used as a shield. You find yourself able to defend against melee attacks more easily, more resistant to poisons, and more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow.

Your tolerance of others has earned you great respect. You find that you are able to defend against magical attacks more easily, you have superior Agility, and you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat.
No one can ever question your valour. Your Morale is increased, you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat, and your Might is increased.
You have found true wisdom. Your Will is stronger, you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, and you are more resistant to wounds.
Your zeal drives you to perfection. You find yourself more resistant to diseases, able to defend against melee attacks more easily, and more resistant to poisons.
This grants you a short ranged attack.
You gain a short-distance ranged attack.
+5.0% to damage from Guile Fellowship Skills
+5.0% to morale restoration from Conviction Fellowship Skills
You receive a bonus to Spider's Guile and Eagle's Cry contributions
Reduced Might - Hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.
You have overcome your humble beginnings and play a mighty role in this age. Your Might is improved.
This enables you to go home to The Shire.
This enables you to quickly return to Michel Delving.
You can raise your own hope value through good old fashion hobbit cheer.
You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.
Although untrained you have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.
Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.
Prone hobbits are easily ignored when they are thought of as a tasty dinner, causing enemies to ignore you.
You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.
Reduced Might - Hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.
Reduced Might - Hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.
Improved Vitality - Hobbits are remarkably tough.
Improved Vitality - Hobbits are remarkably tough.
Improved out of combat Morale Regeneration - Hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.
Improved Morale Regeneration out of combat - Hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.
Improved Fear Resistance - The slow-kindled courage of the Hobbit Race.
Improved Fear Resistance - The slow-kindled courage of the Hobbit Race.
Improved Shadow Mitigation - Hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.
Improved Shadow Mitigation - Hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.
You gain a short-distance melee attack.
You gain a short-distance melee attack.

You receive a bonus to Stallion's Spirit and Ent's Strength contributions.
Your will is greater then most of your fellows among men.
You are destined to greatness -- a Man for the Fourth Age -- but for now you must secure the Third. Your Will is improved.
This enables you to go home to Bree.
This enables you to quickly return to Bree.
Adds a bonus to your fellowships morale.
You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Morale.
Your will is greater then most of your fellows among men.
The Race of Man grows eerily proficient at the art of war. Your Will is improved.
In combat, the Race of Man is known for it's unquenchable spirit.
In combat, the Race of Man is known for its unquenchable spirit.
Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.
Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.
Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.
Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.
The Race of Man, when pressed, respond well to impassioned speeches that raise morale.
Increased Morale Restoration- Men can be roused to action faster than the other races. (heals heal for more on men)
Increased Morale Restoration- Men are more quickly emboldened than the other races.
Improved Strength - The feats of strength that men such as Boromir could accomplish are worthy of song.
Improved Strength - The feats of strength that men such as Boromir could accomplish are worthy of song.
Although untrained you have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.
Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

You are devoted to guiding the race of Man. Your Fate is improved.

This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell.

With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.

You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Power.
Reduced Morale and Out of Combat Morale Regeneration - Elves feel things more deeply than the other races, and are more subject to sorrow.
Reduced Morale and Morale Regeneration out of combat - Elves feel things more deeply than the other races and are more subject to sorrow.
Improved Agility - The Grace of the Eldar is remembered in legend.
Improved Agility - The Grace of the Eldar is remembered in legend.
Reduced Fate - The time of the Elves in Middle-earth is nearly at its end.
Reduced Fate - The time of the Elves in Middle-earth is nearly at its end.

Improved Fate - You are one of the Dwarves' of influence at the end of this age.
You are a dwarf of great influence. Your Fate is improved.
This enables you to go home to Thorin's Gate.
This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate.
For a short amount of time you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker races morale into dust.
For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

Increased Might and Vitality, improved Common damage mitigation - Dwarves are a sturdy race.
Increased Might and Vitality, improved Common damage mitigation - Dwarves are a sturdy race.

Reduced Agility - Dwarves are naturally less agile than the other races.

Reduced Fate - The Dwarves' time in Middle-earth is fading.

Enables the Burglar to use devices such as caltrops, marbles and stun dust.
Enables burglars to use devices such as caltrops, marbles, and stun dust.

Enables burglars to use special tools to faciliate their clever tricks.

Allows the use of books of lore.
This skill instantly cures any fear effects you have, and also makes the entire fellowship immune to fear for a short period of time, as well as acting as a heal over time.
This skill instantly cures any fear effects upon you. It also makes your entire fellowship immune to fear for a short period of time, as well as healing them over time.
Allows the usage of Champion Horns.
Allows the use of champion horns.
